Class QuiltBoard

public class QuiltBoard extends Object
Represents the quilt board of a player

    • canPlacePatch

      public boolean canPlacePatch(Patch patch, Point anchor)
      Returns true if the patch can be placed on the current quilt board If not, returns false.
      Parameters:
      patch - patch to check
      anchor - anchor point for placement reference
      Returns:
      boolean

    • placePatch

      anchor - anchor point for placement reference

      public boolean hasSevenBySevenSquare()
      Checks if the current quiltboard has a full 7x7 square created
      Returns:
      true if there is a 7x7 square placed, if not then false
